column2: <c=@abilitytype>Beast. </c>Channel an expanding stream of flame from above. When the engulfed region reaches its full size, it becomes a fire field.
<c=@abilitytype>Phantasm.</c> Summon illusions that deal damage and inflict vulnerability.
Earned from bosses and events inside Heart of Thorns raids.
Created by combining Radiant Dust and Ancient Infused Parchment in the Mystic Forge.
<c=@abilitytype>Conjure.</c> Manifest a frost bow in your hands and at the target location. Wielders of this weapon gain increased condition duration and healing power.

Recharge reduction can only occur once per use of Life Reap.
